articles.description: American gymnast Simone Biles dazzles on her Olympics return and shows she is back to her best three years after suffering the "twisties".
articles.title: Simone Biles dazzles on Olympic gymnastics return at Paris 2024

articles.description: The swimming leg of the triathlon familiarisation at the Paris Olympics is cancelled due to pollution in the River Seine.
articles.title: Olympic triathlon: River Seine pollution forces familiarisation to be scrapped

articles.description: Superstar scrum-half Antoine Dupont delivers by coming off the bench to lead France to their first gold of the Paris Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics rugby sevens: Antoine Dupont inspires France to gold medal in Paris

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: England host West Indies in the third Test at Edgbaston – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: England vs West Indies LIVE: Third Test, day three, Edgbaston – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: Convicted child rapist Steven van de Velde is booed as he makes his Olympic beach volleyball debut to a mixed reaction in Paris.
articles.title: Steven van de Velde: Convicted child rapist booed on Olympic debut in beach volleyball

articles.description: Manchester United suffer a double injury blow in defeat to Arsenal in their pre-season friendly in Los Angeles.
articles.title: Arsenal v Man Utd: Gunners come from behind as United suffer double injury blow

articles.description: Team GB's Max Litchfield qualifies second fastest for Sunday night's 400m individual medley Olympic final in Paris, behind the home favourite Leon Marchand.
articles.title: Olympics swimming: Max Litchfield into final as home favourite Leon Marchand begins quest for gold

articles.description: Simone Biles is making her return to Olympic competition on Sunday even more hotly anticipated with the possibility she may perform another new move.
articles.title: Simone Biles could try new move at Paris 2024 Olympics
